ese nowanathak satanpata walata hira kara thibena oluwalata nodanena hirikithayak wiwruthawa me desa bala sitinnekuta danenu walakwannata nohakiya.thiyena de walata amatharawa thawath de illa da warjanaya karana waidyawaru wenekekge ayithiya saha himikama kappadukirimata dangalima yam mlechcha thaththwayaki.satana anekage mas raththala gananam eya laba dena piliwela sakas kirimakata ho ee satana rata wenuwen wana awanka hangimakin nam ee hangima matha kriya kara satana wenuwen thaman ath harinnata sudanam waraprasada pilibandawa prakashayak thibiya yuthuya.
